description: The Camellia crapnelliana is an amazing species of Camellia with a stunning array of blooms. Its dazzling ivory-white petals and large, full buds are a sight to behold with a captivating form and scent. Not only is Camellia crapnelliana visually remarkable, but its petals last a truly extraordinary amount of time - up to 12 days! This remarkable species is also quite resilient, able to survive in harsh climates and thrive even in a low-light area. It truly is an incredible plant, perfect for any garden.
